mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_conversation (user_id, title, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
INSERT INTO chat_message (user_id, conversation_id, role, content, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{conversationId}, #{role}, #{content}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE conversation_id = #{conversationId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
